Item 1: পোলাও Item 2:চিকেন রোস্ট \nItem 3:কাবাব Item 4:বিফ রেজেলা \nItem 5: সালাদ,ফিরনি/জর্দা,বোরহানি/কোমোলপানীয়।
1. You can book our community center online \n2. You can also book contacting with manager

-> At first you need to sign up or register 
-> After log in, go to booking page 
-> Filling up the booking form 
-> Choose available date 
-> Book a date

-> You will have to make payment within 48 hours. Otherwise, your booking may be cancelled by admin. 

-> For payment, please contact with our provided contact number. 

-> You can check your booking status from upcoming booking history. 

-> You can cancel your booking request until booking status is Not Confirmed. 

-> After successful payment, your payment status will be Paid and booking status will be Confirmed. 

-> After payment, you will not be able to cancel your booking online. In that case, you will need to contact with admin.
